body.p: The Catalogs tab specifies a list of XML Catalogs, specifically for the edited framework, that are added to list of catalogs that uses to resolve resources.
To open the Catalogs tab of the Document type configuration dialog box, , go to Document Type Association, use the New, Edit, Duplicate, or Extend button, and click on the Catalogs tab.

You can perform the following actions:
Add Opens a dialog box that allows you to add a catalog to the list.
Edit Opens a dialog box that allows you to edit the path of an existing catalog.
Delete Deletes the currently selected catalog from the list.
Move Up Moves the selected catalog up one spot in the list.
Move Down Moves the selected catalog down one spot in the list.
